External domains or URLs identified via.Action: Ingest threat intelligence feeds containing known suspicious domains/URLs (typosquats, C2s, known phishing sites) into Zeek's intel framework. Monitor Zeek intel.log for matches against internal DNS queries (dns.log). Analyze frequency and origin of internal systems attempting to resolve flagged external resources. Use correlation analysis to link lookups to specific internal users or events.

Discovery of externally hosted web conte.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log for connections to domains/URLs flagged by external threat intelligence or OSINT as hosting malicious content. Analyze HTTP request details, user agents, and potential file downloads. Correlate with security alerts from web filters or network sandboxes if available. Use linear regression or time series analysis to model baseline outbound HTTP traffic and identify deviations related to connections to suspicious external sites.
